search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Moxo (moxo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Moxo can be found at: [https://www.moxo.com/pricing](https://www.moxo.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

##### Questions + answers

##### How does Moxo's pricing work?

![Image 27](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612ecbcc615e87b0b9b38524/671aba364291fdff84775860_angle-down-sharp-light%201.svg)

Our pricing for our Business, Business Pro, and Enterprise plans is primarily based on 2 variables: the plan you’d like to use, and the number of active users you purchase on the platform. Add-ons such as the Private Labeled App, support options, or deployment options are charged separately.  
  
We accept payments from most major credit cards. In addition, we can issue invoices payable by bank transfer for Business Pro and Enterprise plans.

##### What is a private labeled app?

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612ecbcc615e87b0b9b38524/671aba364291fdff84775860_angle-down-sharp-light%201.svg)

Moxo offers the ability to private label the mobile app for your business. A small, gray "Powered by Moxo" logo will be visible on some app screens. Private labeled apps are launched as unlisted apps on the Apple App store and as a regular apps on the Google Play store. Unlisted apps on the Apple App store are not publicly searchable/discoverable but can still be downloaded from the App Store via a link. When you invite users, your unlisted app link will be included.

##### What happens when I change plans?

![Image 29](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612ecbcc615e87b0b9b38524/671aba364291fdff84775860_angle-down-sharp-light%201.svg)

Upgrading your plan: Your account will be upgraded and charged immediately. The amount due will be reduced based on the percentage of the billing cycle left at the time the plan was changed.  
  
Downgrading your plan: Your account will be downgraded at the end of your billing cycle.

##### How do I cancel my subscription?

![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612ecbcc615e87b0b9b38524/671aba364291fdff84775860_angle-down-sharp-light%201.svg)

You can cancel your subscription by contacting your Moxo representative or sending an email to customersuccess@moxo.com
